name: react-page-banner
description: A notification banner that absolutedly slides below parent element.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && babel src/PageBanner.jsx --out-file dist/PageBanner.js && node ./scripts/build-dist && cp src/main.scss dist/PageBanner.scss && cp src/page-banner-icons.scss dist/page-banner-icons.scss && node ./scripts/build-dist

author: Points
